meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6770.

div.div: Battle of the Decades: The 1980s game 5.

td.p: Bob Verini, an academic director for a test preparation company from Los Angeles, California
Jerome Vered, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Tom Cubbage, an attorney from Washington, D.C.

tr.td: MYTH DIAGNOSIS
STOCK SYMBOLS
ARCHIPELAGOS
NOTABLE NAMES
THE T IS SILENT
(Alex: ...in each correct response.)
'80s ACTORS & ROLES

Bright Lights, Big City

Bob
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Tom
Jerome
Bob

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Jerome wrote his wager as "US$1600".]
(Alex: Jerome has an impish sense of humor. We love him.)
...
(Alex: The five finalists from this week will come back in May to play for $1 million against the winners of our second and third decades, and we\'ll see you all on Monday for our college championship. That\'s gonna be exciting--younger players. We\'ll see you then.)
JeromeWho are Putin & Medvedev?
$1,600
TomWho are Putin + Medvedev?
$3,801
BobWho are [crossed out]?
$12,001
Putin & Medvedev')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'When these 2 men swapped jobs in 2012, their country\'s media described the move as "castling"')

tr.td: WORLD POLITICS
When these 2 men swapped jobs in 2012, their country's media described the move as "castling"
Tom
Jerome
Bob
Quarterfinalist
2nd place: $5,000
3rd place: $5,000
Tom
Jerome
Bob

16 R,
6 W
(including 2 DDs)

16 R
(including 1 DD),
1 W
